name: Granny's Shake and Sprit'z -5.00 Flavors
description:
"Because you don't wanna smell lika goat!"

Handy 2 oz size of Granny's Shake & Spritz's, made from the same FO's & EO's used in our soaps, pack a punch of flavor!
There is NO skimping on the fragrance in these little babies! Just one spritz goes a long way!
 2 fl. oz size is perfect for carrying in your purse for a freshen up throughout the day or in your front pocket or vehicle - heck spritz your vehicle down! 
You can feel pretty good about using these as they are not full of chemicals like other commercial products can be.
Please refer to the coordinating soaps for a description of scent. (until I get something better figured out)


** Price is determined by the cost of EO's & FO's
** Ingredients: Distilled Water, Witch Hazel, FO's or EO's, Glycerin

name: Wild Verbena
description:
This scent is addictive ~ says one customer
 and it is.  Wild Verbena is native to Africa.  It is a very unusual scent and tends to grow on you. It is refreshing yet deep.
She goes on to say: "verbena is siiky and leaves your skin happy! I love using it especially for shaving, its rich lather is perfect for protection against razor burn. Has a nice citrus scent."

Granny’s Milk Soap is mildly cleansing, super moisturizing & creamy!
This firmer bar of milk soap has a super creamy  lather that is great for shaving, even in hard water.  

What's it got in it?

* Tallow ~ makes a harder bar with a rich creamy lather & is moisturizing
* Cream Heavy Milk ~ for added richness, creaminess & moisture.  
     Super beneficial for skin issues such as psoriasis, eczema & some cases of acne
* Castor Oil ~ (a humectant) for moisture, creaminess & lather 
* Vegetable Shortening ~ for a mild, firm lather (may contain soy)
* Coconut Oil ~ cleansing bubbles
* Sodium Hydroxide aka Lye
* Well Water
* Essential Oil

** Sodium Hydroxide, is an essential component of soap making. It combines with fatty acids of the oils in a process called saponification. After saponification is complete, there is no lye left, just a rich creamy, moisturizing bar of soap that can be used for all your skin care needs!  

** any Essential or Fragrance Oils used are phthalate, paraben & nitro musk free
** ALL Tallow comes from 100% Grass fed Angus Beef from Janzen Family Farms
** Milk used came from Traci, our grass fed Jersey cow

name: Skrappy Starburst Pinwheel Star Quilt
description:
This skrap "Starburst Pinwheel" quilt (as I like to call it) is sometimes referred to as a sawtoothed pinwheel block.

For the BURST I chose a green fabric with little purple flowers & some white flecked flowers.
For contrast a large floral print in purples, greens & browns. 

The binding is from the same color scheme as the floral only it is printed in squares & rectangles (sort of plaid like). 
 
White scrap fabrics make up the large majority of the body of the quilt.

I thought it'd be refreshing to leave the "corners" of the quilt un-square!
So I added no triangles to them!  

This beauty measures 61.5 L x 46 &1/4 W 
& is a perfect size for so many things!
lap, baby,table, chair or a picnic


Sandwiched with Mountain Mist White Rose 100% Cotton Needled Batting

**To get the most life out of any quilt it should be kept free of dirt and grime.
 Washed sparingly and handled with care. Line drying is always preferable. 
Rag quilts are the exception, they should be tumbled dry but can be hung on a line too!

name: Applique & Quilted Fall Turkey Wallhanging
description:
An original, one of a kind wall hanging inspired by nature!  
We have  a trail cam and one photo that was caught was of a hen peeking up into the camera.  She was my inspiration for this piece. 
Done in  Amish colors, her backing is the same maroon as the inner border. 
ALL pieces of this bird are individual and appliquéd. Each color on this turkey's tail is a separate piece of fabric that I have appliquéd and trimmed in small black rickrack.  I used the same rickrack for the hangers. Machine quilted. 
Quilt measures 22" x 26" 
This quilt is delicate due to the piecing and care should be taken when cleaning it. I recommend HAND WASH her ONLY if absolutely necessary and LAY FLAT to dry.  DO NOT wring, machine wash or dry!  She has been washed already.
